comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/534.30 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/12.0.742.112 Safari/534.30

Steps to reproduce:

In Folder Properties, on the Retention Policy tab, there is an option to Always keep starred messages. 



Actual results:

Only an option for starred messages showed.


Expected results:

In Folder Properties, on the Retention Policy tab, there is an option to Always keep starred messages.  This should have some additional options added below it:

#1:Always keep unread messages
#2:Always keep messages with tags (allow selecting any of the currently in use tags)

Then if you had a folder you wanted to auto-purge, but wanted to make sure everything was read, you could set that flag.
